Package it.unibo.dtn.JAL Description

Main package for DTN connections based on JALBP library.

It contains the main classes for opening a BPSocket and for sending Bundles over a DTN connection.

To use this library you have to follow some easy steps:

  1. Get the instance and set the parameters of JALEngine before calling JALEngine.init() function (optional step).
  2. Register one or more BPSockets.
  3. Send/receive Bundles.
  4. Close the BPSockets.
  5. When you will not use anymore the library you should call JALEngine.destroy().

Version:
1.0
Author:
Andrea Bisacchi
